targets.expr:
sum (
sum by (host) (current_voting_right{network="mainnet"})
and
sum by (host) (avg_over_time(validator_service_handle_certificate_consensus_latency{network="mainnet", pct="95"}[5m:1m])) / 1000 < 7.0
) / 10000
